name: Present A Present in the Present
name_original: Present A Present in the Present
description:
You joined a secret Santa program but forgot about it, now you have 24 hours to get a gift together for your assigned secret Santa

This is a very very simple game, and not good by any means. This is also the first game I have ever made, and I would be lying if I said I didn't have a blast making this or that I didn't learn a lot about Clickteam Fusion. I feel the concept has some merit, but my skills were unable to follow through, hopefully I can remake it in the future sometime. This game jam and this game have definitely ignited my game-making hobby and I plan to continue to and improve by participating in more jams and making more games that are hopefully better than this.
